cel src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- src.cel --
[
	{"a":1, "b":2}.as(v, v.a == 1),
	{"a":1, "b":2}.as(v, v),
	{"a":1, "b":2}.as(v, v.with({"c":3})),
	{"a":1, "b":2}.as(v, [v, v]),
]
-- want.txt --
[
	true,
	{
		"a": 1,
		"b": 2
	},
	{
		"a": 1,
		"b": 2,
		"c": 3
	},
	[
		{
			"a": 1,
			"b": 2
		},
		{
			"a": 1,
			"b": 2
		}
	]
]
